message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you and is a great deal.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to spend closer to $9,000.  Would you be willing to come down a bit?
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is quite low for this product considering its value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
